{{Description|The primitive wandering inhabitants of Teyvat's wildernesses.<br />These archers wield simple crossbows, and unmelting ice shrouds their arrowheads. It is said that wounds caused by these arrowheads heal very slowly, as the cold will slow the circulation of blood.|[[Archive]]}}
{{Enemy Intro}}

{{Drops|Hilichurl Shooters}}

==Stats==
{{Enemy Stats|hp_ratio=.8|atk_ratio=.9|hp_type=1}}

==Abilities and Attacks==
*'''Aimed Shot:''' Charges as Cryo energy accumulates on their arrowhead, before firing an arrow at the player, dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Cryo DMG}}.
**'''Enhanced:''' Some Hilichurl Shooters, mostly those in the [[Spiral Abyss]], [[Domains]], or overworld events/challenges, are capable of firing five bolts at a time, covering a ~45 degree arc in front of them.
